sense.def:
To purge an organization of its unacceptable members
pomeni odstraniti iz organizacije nesprejemljive člane. Kadar ljudje
are purged from an organization
, jih vplivne osebe v organizaciji odstranijo, ker se jim zdijo nesprejemljivi.

seg.quote: ...to purge the government of Latimer's supporters.
They had done their best to purge extremists from the party.
They discovered that there were infiltrators inside the party. A purge began.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To purge something of undesirable things
pomeni odstraniti neprijetne stvari iz nečesa.

seg.quote: I tried desperately to purge myself of these dangerous desires.
